# VSCode Settings for antfu/eslint-config

These settings are recommended by [@antfu/eslint-config](https://github.com/antfu/eslint-config) for the best IDE experience.

**What it does:**

- Auto-fix ESLint errors on save
- Silence stylistic rules in the editor (still auto-fixes them)
- Enable ESLint for additional file types (JSON, YAML, Markdown, etc.)

**Learn more:**

- https://github.com/antfu/eslint-config#ide-support-auto-fix-on-save
